description.brief: ROS configuration files for the Mobipick robot

package.description: This repo contains ROS configuration files (URDF description, Gazebo launch files, MoveIt config, move_base config, bringup launch files) for the Mobipick robot (MiR 100 base, UR5 arm, Robotiq 2 Finger Gripper + Force-Torque Sensor, Orbbec Astra Mini S 3D camera).
package.author: Martin Günther/martin.guenther@dfki.de, Santiago Focke/santiago.focke@dfki.de
